H0.text: Taka is the basic monetary unit of which country. India

H1.text: Taka is the basic monetary unit of which country. Pakistan

H2.text: Taka is the basic monetary unit of which country. Nepal

H3.text: Taka is the basic monetary unit of which country. BNGL

A4.text: The taka is the currency of Bangladesh.

A5.text: In the Indian states of West Bengal and Tripura, the official name of the Indian rupee is 'taka'.
